```
  1 /************************************************
  2  * Print a bunch of greetings.                  *
  3  ************************************************/
  4 #include <iostream>
  5
  6 #define MAX =10
  7
  8 int main()
  9 {
 10     int counter;        // Current greeting
 11
 12     for (counter =MAX; counter > 0; --counter)
 13         std::cout <<"Hi there\n";
 14
 15     return (0);
 16 }

```
